name: Mysts of Mycelia (Saatsuki)
description:
Mysts of Mycelia is the first school project I was part of as a game artist. The prototype is mainly based on action but an adventure part was to be developed the following year.

You play as Levia, an adventurer who host a symbiot-like entity that give her powers. But if she uses the symbiot's powers too much, she suffers negative effects.

Here is the support we used for our final presentation, explaining our workflow and presenting the game, in French : https://drive.google.com/file/d/17w32fOEwrCR7ZM7b2Jn3YtKzeJ-QHsA9/view
